    • Constructor Detail

      • Board

        public Board()
        This is the constructor method of the class. It takes no parameters, but creates 6 decks and adds them to an ArrayList of decks. Then it starts up the counters. And the score sums.

    • Method Detail

      • disposeDeck

        public void disposeDeck()
        This method is mostly used for testing and what it does is that it actually removes all decks from the board. This can be used also it some other game is to be played. My initial idea was to make a game in which blackjack to be only a minigame, but the time and the work I had to do seriously affected my plans and ambitions. However this method is still useful for further development of the program.

      • restartSums

        public void restartSums()
        This method restarts the scores of the player and the dealer. This is necessary since you want the player to be able to play more than just one game.

      • restartCoB

        public void restartCoB()
        This method gets rid of all the cards on the table both for the player and the dealer, thus allows the new "round to begin".

      • restartIndex

        public void restartIndex()
        This method restarts the index of the card to be drawn next.

      • newRound

        public void newRound()
        This method clears the scores and the cards on board and allows the next deal to be made.

      • shuffleDecks

        public void shuffleDecks()
        This method shuffles all the decks.

      • getDeck

        public Deck getDeck(int index)
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the deck to be returned
        Returns:
        the deck at the position index

      • checkShuffle

        public void checkShuffle()
        This method checks if 30 cards have been used and if so, then it shuffles all the decks and starts again from the top. This is done to mimic a casino actually doing exactly the same thing maybe in more on less cards, but it doesn't really matter, because in DD casino it is happening on the 30th card.

      • cardIndexIncrement

        public void cardIndexIncrement()
        This just makes the custom pointer- cardIndex to move one position.

      • addPlayerCard

        public void addPlayerCard(int cardValue)
        This method adds the card drawn to the score of the player.
        Parameters:
        cardValue - the value of the card drawn by the player.

      • addDealerCard

        public void addDealerCard(int cardValue)
        This method adds the card drawn to the score of the dealer.
        Parameters:
        cardValue - the value of the card drawn by the dealer.

      • draw

        public Card draw(boolean isPlayer)
        This is the actual method of how the cards are drawn each time.
        Parameters:
        isPlayer - this shows if the player is drawing or the dealer.
        Returns:
        the card drawn.

      • fixAces

        public int fixAces(int score,
                   java.util.ArrayList<Card> cards)
        This method is used to fix the value of the Ace card if needed. Thus to change it from 1 to 11 or 11 to 1.
        Parameters:
        score - the score, which can be changed.
        cards - the cards of the player or the dealer, which will be checked for aces and if they are not actually busted.
        Returns:
        the new score of the player or dealer, depending on which one was passed to the method.

      • addToPScore

        public void addToPScore(int value)
        This method adds the value of the given card to the score of the player.
        Parameters:
        value - the value of the card to be added to the score.

      • addToDScore

        public void addToDScore(int value)
        This method adds the value of the given card to the score of the dealer.
        Parameters:
        value - the value of the card to be added to the score.

      • setScoreP

        public void setScoreP(int value)
        This method sets/changes the score of the player.
        Parameters:
        value - the value of the new score. (This is mainly used from the method fixAces)

      • setScoreD

        public void setScoreD(int value)
        This method sets/changes the score of the dealer.
        Parameters:
        value - the value of the new score. (This is mainly used from the method fixAces)

      • getPlayerScore

        public int getPlayerScore()
        This method is a getter for the player's score
        Returns:
        the score of the player's points

      • getDealerScore
